words.title: debouch
words.example: Passengers in festive clothing debouched from the crowded subway on their way to the parade.

words.title: enisle
words.example: When the dam burst, the torrent of water filled the valley, enisling the highest points of land therein.

words.title: esperance
words.definition: the feeling that what is wanted can be had or that events will turn out for the best.
words.example: The players were full of esperance about their new coach.

words.title: bremsstrahlung
words.definition: radiation emitted by a charged particle when accelerating.s
words.example: The electron hovered around the atomic nucleus, releasing bremsstrahlung as it lost some speed.

words.title: craic
words.definition: fun and entertainment, especially good conversation and company.
words.example: The recent graduates smiled sadly as they agreed that they would miss the craic.
